availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Thomas Cox (Taylor County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier)

body.p: Taylor County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier. Kentucky native. Married to Melvina Cox. Father of A. A. Cox, Angeline Cox, Saphrona Cox, Thomas Cox, Martha J. Cox, Elvira Cox, Wood Cox, and John Cox. Served in the 26th Kentucky Infantry

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Taylor County, Division 1, p. 87.
U.S., Civil War Pension Index: General Index to Pension Files, 1861-1934 NARA RG 15, Microfilm Series T288, Roll 546.
